name: Falling Dream
description:
DreamDude is in trouble. Help DreamDude fight off the Nightmares by falling on them. 

Move Left  = A key

 Move Right =  D key

Pause = Esc

Credits: Thank you to Joel Steudler for all the SFX www.patreon.com/joelsteudler Background Music: "Clouds in a dream" by xXUnderTowerXx licensed  CC-BY-SA 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/clouds-in-a-dream
